接口 ChessGame

  • 所有已知实现类:
    EuropeanChess, Xiangqi

    public interface ChessGame
    An interface that encodes specific rules for a version of chess.
    作者:
    Harold Connamacher, Bruce Dong

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  ChessGame.Side
      The "side" or "team" or "player" the piece belongs to.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default boolean canChangeSelection(ChessPiece piece, int row, int column)
      Returns whether a user can choose a different piece from the one selected or if they have to move the selected piece.
      java.lang.String getGameName()
      Return the name of the game

      Return total columns of the game

      Return total row of the game

      Determines if it is legal to play a given piece.

      Moves a piece to a new position.

    • 方法详细资料

      • legalPieceToPlay

        boolean legalPieceToPlay(ChessPiece piece,
                         int row,
                         int column)
        Determines if it is legal to play a given piece.
        参数:
        piece - the piece to be played
        row - the row of the square the piece is on
        column - the column of the square the piece is on
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move on this turn

      • makeMove

        boolean makeMove(ChessPiece piece,
                 int toRow,
                 int toColumn)
        Moves a piece to a new position.
        参数:
        piece - the piece to move
        toRow - the row of the square the piece is moving to
        toColumn - the column of the square the piece is moving to
        返回:
        true if the move was made, false if the move was not made

      • canChangeSelection

        default boolean canChangeSelection(ChessPiece piece,
                                   int row,
                                   int column)
        Returns whether a user can choose a different piece from the one selected or if they have to move the selected piece. If this method returns false, then the legalPieceToPlay method must not return true if that piece has no legal moves. Otherwise the game could freeze with a player not permitted to change selection of a piece with no legal moves.
        参数:
        piece - the piece the user selected
        row - the row of the square the piece is on
        column - the column of the square the piece is on
        返回:
        true if the player can change the piece they selected and false if they cannot and must move that piece

      • getNumRows

        int getNumRows()
        Return total row of the game
        返回:
        Return total row of the game

      • getNumColumns

        int getNumColumns()
        Return total columns of the game
        返回:
        Return total columns of the game

      • startGame

        void startGame(ChessBoard board)
        It will take the given board and set all pieces and then set internal fields and then it can begin
        参数:
        board - The board that want to place

      • getGameName

        java.lang.String getGameName()
        Return the name of the game
        返回:
        Return the name of the game
